parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: The target Unix timestamp (ms) to count down to.

parameters.name: startOnMount
parameters.description: Whether the timer starts automatically on component mount. Default: false.

parameters.name: options.interval
parameters.description: Frequency of UI updates in milliseconds. Default: 1000.

parameters.name: options.onTick
parameters.description: Callback triggered on every tick with the current remaining time.

parameters.name: options.onComplete
parameters.description: Callback triggered once the remaining time reaches zero.

returnValues.name: count
returnValues.description: The current remaining time in milliseconds.

returnValues.name: status
returnValues.description: The current status of the timer. Status types are 'start', 'running', 'paused', and 'completed'.

returnValues.name: controls.start
returnValues.description: Initiates the countdown if status is 'start'

returnValues.name: controls.pause
returnValues.description: Pauses the timer and stores the remaining duration.

returnValues.name: controls.resume
returnValues.description: Resumes a paused timer by calculating a new end timestamp.

returnValues.name: controls.reset
returnValues.description: Clears the timer and reverts to the initial duration.

returnValues.name: controls.increment
returnValues.description: Adds the specified milliseconds to the current countdown.
